summary: The Celestial Bow is truly the Ultimate Bow. It fires much faster than a regular bow and is more powerful. Its arrows have much greater range, velocity and flies at a much flatter trajectory (similar to a crossbow). Comes with various craftable, regular and enchanted celestial arrows.

[b][color=#00ffff][b][b][b][b][b]This mod will also be made available for [u]Skyrim Special Edition[/u], [b][b][b][b][b]which can be found[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12363?]here[/url].[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/color]
[color=#ffff00]

[img=centre]https://i.imgur.com/NLIG0vJ.jpg[/img]

The Celestial Bow[/color][/b]

The Celestial Bow is truly the ultimate bow.

It fires 50% faster than a regular bow and it is more powerful, which means an arrow fired from it has much greater range, velocity and a much flatter trajectory than normal arrows (very similar to firing a crossbow bolt).

The bow can also be equipped with various [u][b]craftable enchanted celestial arrows[/b][/u].


[color=#ffff00][b]What this mod does?[/b][/color]

This mod will allow you to craft the following awesome items at the forge under the steel tab (needs [b]Steel Smithing[/b] perk):

- Celestial Bow------------------------------(Very beautiful and powerful bow)
- Celestial Arrow----------------------------(Basic Arrow for the Celestial Bow)
- Celestial Arrow (Explosive Fire)---------(Exactly the same effect as Dawnguard Crossbow Explosive Fire bolt)
- Celestial Arrow (Explosive Frost)--------(Exactly the same effect as Dawnguard Crossbow Explosive Ice bolt)
- Celestial Arrow (Explosive Shock)-------(Exactly the same effect as Dawnguard Crossbow Explosive Shock bolt)
- Celestial Arrow (Paralyze)----------------(Paralyze target for 10 seconds upon impact.)
- Celestial Arrow (Soul Trap)---------------(Soul trap any target within 30s on impact, provided you have a corresponding size soul gem in your inventory)
- Celestial Arrow (Chaos Absorb)----------(Absorbs 25 points of health, stamina and magika from the target, upon impact)

For those players who wish to earn the bow through gameplay, rather than crafting it, it is obtainable by defeating the final Draugr Overlord boss at the Bleak Falls Barrow, Dragon Word Wall. It is in a chest at the right of the draugr platform. See the file images for a visual guide of it's location.


[color=#ffff00][b]Enchanted Arrows[/b][/color]

Having played much as a stealthy archer, I much prefer the bow over the crossbow. But then having played with the crossbows, I discovered that I really wanted to have a bow that could fire arrows, the way a crossbow fires bolts.

I thought it very unfair that you could obtain crossbows that have the same range as bows, but which fired bolts at supersonic speeds, and had 50% armor penetration, and exploded with extra fire, ice or shock damage!

I decided to create a bow that will fire like a modern, re-curved, high-tension, compound bow, with lighter metallic arrows that flew like crossbow bolts. I also took into consideration that to keep it fair (considering the advantages of the new Dawnguard crossbows) the bow should also be able to fire exploding arrows, similar to the exploding crossbow bolts. It is balanced compared to the crossbow, with the same firing effect, but having 50% increased firing speed, in order to balance out the crossbow's 50% armor penetration.

One thing that made life difficult as an archer, was to Soul Trap targets. To do this effectively without an enchanted bow, you would have to damage the target to a point, switch from two handed bow weapon to a magic spell, equip that, cast the soul trap spell, switch back to the two handed bow, kill the target, and then only the spell would work.

With the increased firing rate of the Celestial bow, and to keep things balanced, I decided that the bow shouldn't be enchantable. So to resolve the issue of the soul trap, I finally decided to create a Soul Trap Arrow, which does all of the above, in one action.

For fun, I also added two other enchantable arrows - namely Paralyze (Area of Effect) and Chaos Absorb (provides the same effect as the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dwarven_Black_Bow_of_Fate]Dwarven Black Bow of Fate[/url]).

Be warned about the Paralysis arrows: it is an area of effect enchantment that will paralyze not only the target, but you as well, if you are less than 10 meters from the target when you use it.


[color=#ffff00][b]Origin & Mod Objective[/b][/color]

The Celestial Bow is a re-texture of Auriel's bow. I love the look of this weapon and added it as a stand-alone mod. You do not need Dawnguard to use it.

It is basically an enhanced version of Zephyr, but with flatter trajectory arrow flight. The Celestial bow and arrows does the same base damage as the Ebony bow and arrows.

The Celestial Arrow model is a new re-texture the Steel Arrow. The quiver has a new modern look to it, and blends well with the bow's appearance. The arrow shafts are now metallic, instead of wooden (which partially explains their increased impact, range and velocity).



[color=#ffff00][b]Versions[/b][/color]

[color=#ff7700][b]1)  [u]Normal Version[/u][/b][/color]

This version of the bow is [u]not enchantable[/u]. It fires 50% faster than a normal bow. It is craftable or obtainable by killing a draugr boss.
It comes with [u]regular (non-enchanted) celestial arrows only[/u]. The bow and the celestial arrows both does a base damage of 20.
The celestial arrows are metallic and flies much straighter (flatter trajectory) than regular arrows - similar to a crossbow bolt.
The version is for players who is of the opinion that the enchantable version or enchanted arrows versions might be overpowered).


[color=#00ff00][b]2)  [u]Enchanted Arrows Version[/u][/b][/color]

This version of the bow is [u]not enchantable[/u]. It fires 50% faster than a normal bow. It is craftable or obtainable by killing a draugr boss.
It comes with [u]regular and enchanted celestial arrows[/u]. The bow and the celestial arrows both does a base damage of 20.
The celestial arrows are metallic and flies much straighter (flatter trajectory) than regular arrows - similar to a crossbow bolt.


[color=#00ffff][b]3)  [u]Enchantable Version[/u][/b][/color]

This version of the bow [u][b]is[/b] enchantable[/u]. It fires 50% faster than a normal bow. It is craftable or obtainable by killing a draugr boss.
It comes with [u]regular and enchanted celestial arrows[/u]. The bow and the celestial arrows both does a base damage of 20.
The celestial arrows are metallic and flies much straighter (flatter trajectory) than regular arrows - similar to a crossbow bolt.




[color=#ffff00][b]Compatibility[/b][/color]

This standalone mod adds a new bow, arrows, enchantments, crafting- and improving recipes to the game & should be compatible with most other mods.
